result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?

result.ga: tá sé go dona inniu
result.html: tá sé go dona inniuIt's terrible today.

result.html: tá mé go donaI am doing poorly [not well].

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
